original_title: People’s Bank selects millionaire winner for May in ‘People’s Remittance Vaasi Kotiyai 2023’ draw
original_body_lines: People’s Bank’s ‘People’s Remittance Vaasi Kotiyai 2023’ draw to select the millionaire winner for the month of May took place at the People’s Bank, Overseas Customer Services premises at Colombo 10 recently.
In addition to that, the weekly winners for the period from 14 May to 24 June, were also drawn at the event, and will be gifted Rs. 100,000 each.

People’s Bank Senior Deputy General Manager – Overseas Customer Services Rohan Pathirage, Assistant General Manager – Corporate Banking Dammika Dasanayake, Assistant General Manager – Human Resources Manjula Dissanayake, Assistant General Manager – OCS Aruni Liyanagunawardana, Assistant General Manager – Audit Shantha Gangabadage, Chief Manager – OCS Renuka Arunasalam, Senior Manager – OCS Thilini Perera, Senior Manager – IT Vipula Warnakula, and Western Province Department of Revenue Senior Tax Officer Nuwan Munasinghe participated in the event.

People’s Bank launched the ‘Vaasi Kotiyai 2023’ draw to encourage and appreciate Sri Lankan migrant workers who work tirelessly to strengthen the country’s economy and build a better life for themselves and their families.
